list.name: Eco-Fusion
list.tag_line: Mobile Apps for Preventing or Managing Chronic Diseases
list.description:
Eco-Fusion is a digital therapy company, offering a flexible mobile platform that helps prevent or treats a variety of chronic illnesses, including stress, anxiety, diabetes, obesity, and cardio-vascular diseases.
Unlike large care management systems that require an IT project to get off the ground, Eco-Fusion requires no more than a smartphone and is effective from day one. Its first product, Serenita, accurately measures and treats stress. It was named "Best Health App of the Year" by the Doctors 2.0 organization in June 2015 and has produced significant results in clinical trials on diabetic populations. The platform suits primary and specialty care clinics and payers concerned about escalating treatment cost and low adherence rates.

list.name: Breathe.me
list.description:
Breathe.me develops an ultra-low cost Asthma/COPD monitoring and management solution, using an acoustic sensor and mobile application for lung function testing.
It is a tiny mobile device that communicates wirelessly with any mobile phone. The Acoustic sensor transforms airflow to a varying pitch whistle sound. The sound is recorded on a mobile phone and using proprietary algorithms, calculates peak flow and total lung capacity, FEV1 and other Spirometric values. The application connects to a cloud service that receives alerts in case of medical emergency.

list.name: Intensix
list.tag_line: Improving Clinical Outcomes Using Real-Time Analytics
list.description:
The Intensix platform is comprised of analytical tools that provide operational, financial and clinical benefits to all layers of ICU management and staff.
Deployed as a standalone app or integrated into an existing solution, the platform harnesses the vast amount of available ICU data to deliver highly accurate predictive clinical analytics that provide hospital management and medical personnel with the preemptive information they require to better manage the ICU floor.
The Intensix solution is expected to reduce the average length of stay, a benefit that directly lowers the hospitals’ treatment costs and frees up revenue-producing ICU beds for other patients.

list.name: Hexa
list.description:
Hexa is a 3D content creation platform that automatically converts low cost 2D images into flexible 3D objects at the fraction of time. By doing so, the company is able to significantly lower visualization costs while enhancing shopper's online experience.
Before being able to sell products online, retailers must shoot their products. In the online fashion industry, this costly process is valued at $15 per product page mainly due to the use of expansive models, styling and the need for detailed images. Since some retailers have over 100,000 items on site, thousands are being replaced on a weekly basis, it's obvious why reducing visualization cost and time is a necessity.
list.address: David Yellin Street 2, Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel

list.name: Precog
list.tag_line: Predictive Maintenance and Control for Industrial Systems
list.description:
Precog is the only predictive maintenance solution for complex industrial sites that combines both expert’s knowledge and machine learning and as such can work with any type of equipment.
Precog was selected by BASF SE (ETR: BAS), General Electric (NYSE: GE) and others. Precog is also part of the GE Predix program.

list.name: Genoox
list.description: Genoox is a big data platform for analyzing and managing genetic data in the Cloud. It helps medical experts rapidly provide personalized treatments to their patients based on accurate genetic and clinical data. The platform also enables clinical disease researchers to find genetic patterns and similarity in mutations easily and intuitively. It uses deep learning methods and dedicated compression algorithms for solving the storage and analysis challenges typical to the clinical genomics space.

list.name: Signals Analytics
list.tag_line: Decision Analytics for New Product Development
list.description:
Signals Analytics was founded by two former military intelligence officers.
Signals Analytics is a data analytics company that delivers intelligence and insights to Fortune 5,000 companies to support product development and growth. Signals Analytics has the ability to support corporate decision-making by turning external 'big data' into actionable insights for strategic commercial decisions. This is powered by the Signals Playbook™, an intelligence software platform, developed to quickly transform multiple external data and unstructured data sources covering consumers, markets, and technologies into tangible, constantly updated insights on how to grow products and brands.
Signals Analytics has achieved the following awards:
- Called by Forbes 'the App Store for Innovation'
- Named a 2016 'Gartner Cool Vendor'
- Awarded by the Deloitte 'Fast 50 Technology company'
Signals Playbook™ is a powerful delivery platform that allows both executives and data-driven users to intuitively consume insights and interact with the underlying analyses and data on different granularity levels. 
We are proudly venture-backed by Qumra Capital, Sequoia Capital, and TPY Capital.

list.name: Veed.me
list.description:
Veed.me is the new way to order a video for marketing needs. Veed.me is a video-creation marketplace that connects any business in need of a video with talented videographers worldwide who can make it happen.
With a fast-growing community of over 3,000 videographers and hundreds of videos being created, Veed.me serves all sorts of companies, from SMBs to large companies with recurring video needs.

list.name: Neomatix
list.tag_line: Tire Pressure Monitor for Vehicle Fleets
list.description:
Neomatix Ltd has developed a proprietary tire monitoring solution. By using a disruptive vision-based technology, the company's solutions enable cost effective tire monitoring for both fleet operators and drivers, helping customers improve driving safety, save on operational expenses and decrease off-road time and CO2 emissions.
TireCheck™ enables drivers to check their tire pressure in a fun and clean manner, thus promoting driving safety, higher fuel efficiency and reduced carbon emissions. The app shows the nearest service stations and even the recommended inflation pressure. Interactive tutorials guide the user through the process and crowd wisdom enables constant addition of new car and tire models, as well as user generated service sites.  A branded white label version gains immediate access to the thriving global app market while providing real value to its users, enhanced by tailor made features, content and design.
Optimus is an electro-optic tire monitoring system for vehicle fleets based on computer vision technology.

list.name: SecBI
list.description:
The SOC Investigation Platform from SecBI is a power tool for security analysts. It turns masses of big data from SIEM and logs into actionable intelligence so that companies can investigate and mitigate threats quickly and accurately.
SecBI is the first solution designed both to reduce the complexity of security investigations through the power of machine learning and to provide optimized mitigation recommendations based on an analysis of the business impact of both the threat and the suggested response.

list.name: Sight Diagnostics
list.description:
SightDx is a medical device company developing a novel platform for diagnosing blood diseases using computer vision technology. 
Our detection technology combines cutting edge applications from the fields of computer hardware, software and biology to deliver the fastest and most accurate diagnostic performance. Our flagship product, Parasight, identifies, enumerates and speciates malaria more accurately than all other currently used diagnostics. In the future, our platform technology will be used to identify additional anomalies in blood and body fluids.

The Parasight platform consists of a Scanning and Analyzing Device as well as a Sample Preparation Kit containing custom-built disposable plastic cartridges to create an efficient, standardized and uniform version of the “thin blood smear”, that is easy to prepare within 15 seconds. These cartridges require only a small drop of blood that can be obtained with a finger-stick or from a tube.

SightDx monitors the Parasight status in real-time using an RMS (Remote Management System), and provides quick, customized remote repair and software upgrade services.

list.name: SpirCare
list.description:
SpirCare is developing an innovative device that measures the Functional Residual Capacity (FRC) of the lungs without causing breathing interruptions and without requiring patient cooperation.
The SpirCare device is a small, mobile, hand held device that replaces the unpleasant, cumbersome and expensive available devices for lung volume measurements (like body plethysmography) Providing COPD patient monitoring at home, in clinics and at bedside, anywhere, anytime, even without patient consciousness.
The SpirCare device can be connected to spirometers, ventilators and to any other tube shaped device that is connected to the patient’s mouth.

list.name: Fusic
list.description:
Fusic is a social video platform that lets users display their talent by creating a mash-up cover video of themselves singing karaoke, lip-syncing duets, or dancing with their favorite artists by integrating themselves into the original clip.
A fun and simple way for useres to log their love for music, meet new people, and share their passion for music with their friends.
For marketers, Fusic is the first “karaoke meets music video” platform that allows them to harness a key consumer passion point in a variety of ways and build an on-going community of enthusiasts.

list.name: Shopic
list.tag_line: Changes User Experience of Buying in Stores
list.description:
Shopic changes the user experience in brick-n-mortar stores.
Shopic is an innovative shopping app that lets you skip the checkout line by purchasing your items directly in the app. Say you only have a few items you want to buy, but the line is 15 people long and the cashier is slow. Ain’t nobody got time for that. So what you do is scan the barcodes of your items and select checkout. 
Shopic’s payment system lets you securely and safely upload your payment method and purchase on a PCI-approved standard. It’s also free to download and use, so you know that you will only be charged for the purchases that you make.
In addition, Shopic keeps you up-to-date on sales, discounts and coupons.

list.name: Knowmail
list.description:
Knowmail is a messaging assistant built to help you communicate and collaborate more effectively. Knowmail is specifically designed in order to help professionals efficiently manage email overload, prioritize work objectives, and make sure that they are always on top of their game while optimizing their work/life balance.

Knowmail’s unique machine learning based algorithms were specifically designed to tailor themselves to suit your emailing needs. Initially, Knowmail works silently in the background, understanding your emailing habits and analyzing a series of key communication variables. Once it understands your needs, it springs into action.

list.name: Kwik
list.tag_line: Button-activated IoT Ordering of Goods and Services
list.description:
Kwik is an end-to-end IoT platform that connects customers to retailers and service providers. The system simplifies instant purchasing of goods and services, enabling subscribers to order what they need by simply pressing an activated button placed on a surface at home.
The system is comprised of wirelessly-connected buttons that adhere to surfaces (walls, cabinets, etc.). Users sign up with a given retailer or sevice provider, authorize automatic payment, and order instantly by pressing  Users can monitor their orders via the synced Kwik mobile app.

list.name: Teva Pharmaceuticals
list.description:
Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd (NYSE: TEVA) is a leading global pharmaceutical company, committed to increasing access to high-quality healthcare by developing, producing and marketing affordable generic drugs as well as innovative and specialty pharmaceuticals and active pharmaceutical ingredients.
Headquartered in Israel, Teva is the world's leading generic drug maker, with a global product portfolio of more than 1,000 molecules and a direct presence in approximately 60 countries. Teva's Specialty Medicines businesses focus on CNS, respiratory oncology, pain, women's health, and other therapeutic areas. Teva currently employs approximately 45,000 people around the world and reached $20.3 billion in net revenues in 2014.

list.name: HEALTHYMIZE
list.tag_line: Home Monitoring of Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
list.description:
HEALTHYMIZE offers real-time, remote monitoring of Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) to detect a worsening of symptoms that often leads to patient hospitalization. So-called exacerbations— including shortness of breath, volume and color of phlegm — can be triggered by a bacterial or viral infection, or by a decline in surrounding air-quality.
Using data gathered through sensors, desktop software and mobile devices, HEALTHMIZE's fusion algorithms are processed to signal changes to physicians, caregivers and family members. By providing a more immediate awareness of patients' condition, HEALTHYMIZE reduces healthcare utilization and costs while improving patients’ quality of living.

list.name: Mobideo Technologies
list.description:
Mobideo is an enterprise mobility platform providing real-time situational awareness of critical operations.
Mobideo’s real-time operations management software offers a robust platform to deliver mobile solutions that address the human resource component of complex business operations in discrete and continuous process industries.
 Mobideo absorbs all task execution activities at the most granular step-by-step level, the “how” things get done in any operation setting, by policies, procedures and best practices. Task execution details, together with data retrieved from ERP and other 3rd party enterprise software, are rapidly converted to a custom mobile application designed for tough environments which not only captures and validates all data entered but also captures the time and location of every granular step executed by the worker.
 This way, Mobideo enforces compliance to proper safety, environmental and other risk mitigation standards; guides and prevents workers from making mistakes; captures and validates all task execution at the point of service. Simultaneously Mobideo enables managers to gain situational awareness and real-time visibility into the status of tasks, monitor productivity and ensure better decisions in real-time based on event-driven reporting and predictive analytics.

list.name: Dynamic Yield
list.description: Dynamic Yield helps marketers, e-Commerce, and Media brands maximize revenue by quantifying, optimizing, and personalizing every customer interaction in real time across any channel. It offers a unified customer engagement platform integrating customer segmentation, automated personalization, yield optimization, recommendations, and one-to-one omnichannel messaging across Web, mobile apps, and email.
list.address: Ben Yehuda Street 32, Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel

list.name: PhysiMax Technologies
list.description:
PhysiMax Technologies Ltd is a technology company and a graduate of the Georgia Tech accelerator program. PhysiMax has built the first real-time Athletic Movement Assessment solution, reliably scoring an athlete's risk of injury and athletic performance. It offers a cloud-based movement assessment service to automatically capture and extract the human quality of motion with no markers, identify and measure full-body kinematic events, and weigh and convert measurements into evidence-based performance scoring.
PhysiMax serves top athletic business programs and prominent healthcare organizations. PhysiMax technology has been validated by three top US academic institutions: University of North Carolina, University of Connecticut and the US Military Academy at West Point.

list.name: AlgoValue
list.tag_line: Online Valuation Platform and Cap Table Analysis
list.description:
AlgoValue is an online valuation platform and cap table analysis to valuate early stage and mature companies as well as their equity securities, including preferred stock, convertible notes, warrants, stock options, common shares, and others.
In addition, AlgoValue enables users to simulate consequences of future funding rounds/M&A/IPO in terms of founders and other investor holdings. Lastly, AlgoValue is used for financial reporting and tax compliance and produces templates that are workpaper-ready, saving hours of time for financial statement auditors.
AlgoValue is used by startups, private companies, valuation firms, accounting firms, venture capital firms, law firms, and secondary market platforms in the US, Israel and Europe.

list.name: CropX
list.tag_line: Adaptive Irrigation Software to Optimize Water Use
list.description:
CropX is an agro-analytics company that has developed an adaptive irrigation service for optimizing irrigation. The system saves up to 25% of the water and energy used for irrigating large ﬁelds and achieves a corresponding increase in crop yield.
The company’s system automatically analyzes in real time the exact water needs of different parts of each ﬁeld, and then guides irrigation accordingly. Wireless sensors send their readings to the CropX cloud where its patent-pending pattern-recognition analysis determines the right amount of water each part of the ﬁeld needs.

list.name: Farm Dog
list.tag_line: App for Pest and Disease Management
list.description:
Farm Dog has developed a comprehensive, standardized system for pest and disease management that includes an in-field workflow tool and web dashboard supported by data analytics.
Farm Dog's app allows users to record pest, disease, weeds, trap counts, and other findings; geo-reference and photograph findings; keep track of field visits and set reminders for special checkups; return to past hotspots and visit neglected areas; receive pest notices; and send external reports from the field.

list.name: SCREEMO
list.description:
SCREEMO helps brands to engage with their customers and create a call to action that drive up sales and promote products. Using fun and engaging, connected devices (IoT) campaigns that runs in brick and mortar stores, QSRs, Cinema etc. on public connected devices such as digital screens and attract customers to interact using their smartphones or wearables
SCREEMO patent pending, Do It Yourself SaaS enables designers to create connected devices campaigns in a codeless manner without needing developers, which makes it easy and affordable for any content creator.

list.name: Beyon3D
list.description:
Beyon3D is a multidisciplinary building technology company. Beyon3D develops an innovative digital manufacturing system, based on the use of industrial robotic arms and custom made software tools and hardware.
The company aims to disrupt the multi-billion dollar - yet inefficient - construction market by bringing about a robotic based system that can manufacture building components in higher quality, faster, cheaper, in any scale or geometrical shape.
Beyon3D supports architects and designers in realizing non-standard, complex projects at all scales. Utilizing the latest File-To-Factory strategies, we deliver high quality, custom solutions to our clients, to take advantage of the efficiency and flexibility of parametric modelling, as well as digital manufacturing quality, precision, and speed.

list.name: BE Financial Technology
list.description:
BE Financial Technology Ltd  provides an automated ETP (Exchange Traded Products) platform. The system enables its users to efficiently collect all the parameters necessary for evaluating the Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) of each ETP in a competing ETP group.

Finding the relevant comparison group is simplified with our user-friendly search and filter tools. This system enables users to easily find the index or other benchmark they need and link them directly to the relevant ETPs for comparison. In addition to comparing ETPs’ trading relative to their benchmark level in real time, BE System captures this intraday data and generates meaningful historic statistics, to help users get a broader perspective on how well the ETPs track their respective benchmarks.

BE provides a benchmark tool for financial advisors enabling them to create their own comparing model.
list.address: Menachem Begin Road 37, Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel

list.name: Wiseye Video Systems
list.description:
Wiseye Video Systems Ltd, is the innovative leader in end-user behavior platforms for retail and store chains. Wiseye enables store managers to react in real time to the different situations that can occur during the opening hours of the store as well as advanced store inventory planning. The platform assists store managers to dynamically allocate the staff within the store, automatically spot Out-of-Stock locations and highlight which areas are more visited in comparison to others. In addition, the platform provides an accurate view of the customer behavior from the moment he enters the store.

Wiseye Retail Efficiency Monitoring delivers incredibly reliable real time key performance figures to enhance the profitability of your retail business. The system has been successfully commissioned within three retail chains in Israel, and currently being implemented throughout their branches across Israel and Europe.

list.name: Museloop
list.tag_line: Mobile App for Engaging Art in Museums
list.description:
Museums haven't changed much in decades while the way the world is experienced has, especially for the younger generations. Museums get that and are looking to technology to solve this problem. Young people visiting museums are often experiencing a passive visit detached from the way they live.

Museloop'saugmented reality gaming platform allows museums to easily create a mobile app for their visitors, allowing museums to focuson the content, while Muselooptakes care of users and engagement. By creating engaging experiences, vast amounts of of quality data on visitors are collected.

The game-based museum tour experience puts the art at the front and center and uses the games to deliver relevant, interesting and contextual content. Museloopbuilt templates of games and a CMS. Once museums put content in, an app that provides a unique experience can be immediately generated.

TheSaaS platform offers asolution for any exhibition (permanent or temporary) and museum, from the top tier to the long tail of thousands of museums facing the same challenges with no affordable solutions.

list.name: TravelersBox
list.tag_line: Convert Your Leftover Change to Virtual Currency
list.description:
TravelersBox allows international travelers to deposit their leftover currency when leaving their travel destination.

TBX operates kiosks in airports around the world that enable travelers to convert their leftover money into the online space. Coins and bills can be uploaded onto wellknown international brands through eWallets (PayPal, Qiwi, Neteller), gift companies (iTunes, Skype, Starbucks, etc.), or donated to a variety of causes.

TBX also provides an application for use on tablets located at airport change facilities. Cash is collected by the change teller and, using the TBX application, travelers easily choose the online destination of their cash.

list.name: Woosh Water Systems
list.description:
woosh provides an end-to-end solution for drinking water in the public space- drinking water for smart cities. City streets, public parks, college campuses, transportation hubs, and recreational areas can be transformed into a plastic-free zone. The city's residents and visitors only need to bring their own bottle and woosh does the rest providing a network of water stations that is intergraded with the smart city water grid.

The woosh water stations are designed specifically for the urban lifestyle and provide clean, healthy, and affordable water to people "on the go۝. Inside each station there is patent pending purification system and, bottle cleansing systems for re-usable bottles. The woosh water stations are user-friendly, fully computerized and remotely monitored by a control center, providing 24/7 services.

woosh helps people save money, save the environment, and stay healthy. It provides an easy way for ecofriendly water consumption.
list.address: Martin Gehl Street 8, Petah Tikva, Israel

list.name: Zirra
list.description:
By collecting and assembling information from hundreds of public sources and having real human analysts curate the data and add exclusive insights, Zirra is the only financial platform that provides investors with the tools they need to invest successfully in private companies.

Zirra takes an unbiased stand between start-ups and their potential investors, because we aim to provide investors with clear cut facts and true values of companies they are considering investing in.

list.name: TextLab
list.description: TextLab improves Conversion through Delivering the Right Text to the Right User at the Right Time.

list.name: Convexum
list.description: Convexum is developing a pioneering solution for eliminating the rising threat of uncontrolled or malicious use of commercial drones.

list.name: Amdocs
list.description: Amdocs is the market leader in customer experience software solutions and services for the worlds largest communications, entertainment and media service providers.

list.name: Splitty
list.tag_line: Combines different reservation types to find the cheapest hotel
list.description: Splitty gets the lowest hotel rates for travelers by splitting the same stay into two reservations. Our split and match technology finds the most efficient way to structure your reservation so that you consistently get the cheapest rates without affecting your trip plans.
